name: Fate/Unlimited Codes
overview: In Fate/Unlimited Codes, handheld fighting reaches a whole new level of drama and excitement, where warriors clash in a battle Royale for the Holy Grail. Based on the visual novel Fate Stay night, Fate unlimited Codes takes place in a local town in Japan where seven pairs of Masters and Servants compete for the Holy Grail that will grant them any wish. This compelling combat experience features a deep roster of characters and unique fighting moves, while employing a fast-paced, weapons-based fighting system that is sure to meet any Capcom fans highest expectations.
